content: नेपथ्यं {@--1@} Decoration, an ornament. {@--2@} Dress, apparel, costume, attire; उदारनेपथ्यभृत् <ls>R. 6. 6</ls>; राजेंद्रनेपथ्यविधानशोभा <ls n="R.">14. 9</ls>; उज्ज्वलनेपथ्यविरचना <ls>Māl. 1</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 7</ls>; <ls>V. 5.</ls> {@--3@} Particularly, the costume of an actor; विरलनेपथ्ययोः पात्रयोः प्रवेशोस्तु <ls>M. 1.</ls> {@--4@} The tiring-room, the space where the actors attire themselves (which is always behind the curtain), the postscenium; नेपथ्ये ‘behind the scenes’.
